hero.title: Hello, I'm Alejandro Fernández
hero.tagline: I am a recently-graduated Computer Engineer from Barcelona, Spain.

portraitAlt: Alejandro Fernández smiling in a grey polo shirt

codingEnthusiast.heading: Programmer
codingEnthusiast.description: Programming is my passion. Few things are more satisfying than solving complex problems and bringing ideas to life through code.

hardWorker.heading: Hard worker
hardWorker.description: My commitment to computer engineering has driven me to excel academically, completing 20 subjects with honors during my studies.

teamPlayer.heading: Team player
teamPlayer.description: Participating in team-based programming contests has sharpened my ability to collaborate and communicate effectively with fellow developers.

selectedProjects.heading: Selected Projects
selectedProjects.description: Take a look below at some interesting projects that I worked on during my studies.
